meanings.definition: The act of putting or arranging something in a particular position or order.
meanings.sent1: She carefully adjusted the placings of the books on the shelf.
meanings.sent2: The placings of the chairs in the room made it look neat and organized.
meanings.sent3: The placings of the ingredients in the recipe were crucial for its success.
meanings.sent4: Her placings of the flowers in the vase created a beautiful arrangement.
meanings.sent5: The placings of the puzzle pieces determined how quickly it could be solved.

meanings.definition: The position or rank achieved in a competition or race.
meanings.sent1: His placings in the running race were impressive, earning him a medal.
meanings.sent2: The horse's placings in the competition showed its skill and speed.
meanings.sent3: The placings of the dogs in the race made the audience cheer loudly.
meanings.sent4: Her placings in the spelling bee reflected her dedication to studying.
meanings.sent5: The placings of the cars in the race determined the winner.
